text_block_list.text: The Selection Race. One of the largest events at the academy, where horsegirls display their abilities to prospective trainers.
Among the many eager girls trying their hardest, one ran at tremendous pace, all the while carrying a relaxed expression.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Let's kick it up a gear!

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: (Waaaaaaaah!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Ma- Maruzensky speeds up further! The gap between her and the rest grows larger! She's running her own race!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah, hah… Mmm, the wind feels so nice!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: T- This is…!
Her running form is strong, beautiful, faster than the wind—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Faster… I can go faster!!
And above all, she was kicking the ground with more joy and comfort than anyone else on the course.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: And the race is over! Maruzensky takes first place! With an overwhelming run that left the others far behind!

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: (Waaaahhhh…!!!)

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Pheew! Aah, that felt so good—♪ I'm almost sad to reach the finish.

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Maruzenskyyyy! I didn't expect anything less! You're amazing! You're awesome!

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: I-I've never seen a time like this before…!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh my, you girls! Thanks for all your support!!

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: You inspire me! I want to be as fast as you! Please run with me again sometime!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Eheheh, sure thing! We could do it right after this if you like! I'm always up for a run♪

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: I-is she really saying that after winning by a mile…? This girl's something else…!

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: This must be what they mean when they say she's running on a different engine. I'd sure love to have her…!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Let's see… Oh?

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: Maruzensky, you're the ace I've been looking for! Maruzensky, can I talk to you for a moment!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh dear～…
Naturally, after that Selection Race, she was quickly swarmed with trainers looking to contract her.
But—

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Maruzensky, you can be an undefeated Triple Crown horsegirl! Come make it big with me!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh my, going big sounds nice and all but… I'm sorry. Thanks for your passionate invitation.

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: You will be a legendary horsegirl one day! Let me help you make your mark on history!!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ahahah, aren't you exaggerating a little? I don't think I'm capable of that much. Sorry♪
No matter how many trainers approached her, she politely turned them all down.

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Maruzensky… She's constantly been approached by trainers long before the Selection Race. I wonder why she turns them all down…?

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: I'm sure she has her sights set way higher than even those trainers have!

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: I- I see, of course…! I can't wait to see her find a trainer who suits her and take to the big stages…
In the end, Maruzensky did not sign with anyone that day.
—One evening a few days later.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Pheeew…
I happened to pass by the training course when I saw Maruzensky running, her hair swaying in the wind.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: There's still time… Rightio, let's go another round♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: —Hup!!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ha, hah, ha… Heheh!
The same feeling I felt during the Selection Race came over me again.
How does she—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Faster… faster…!!
What a fun and comfortable looking way to run…!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hah, hahh… Pheeew～. That hits the spot♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh, dearie me? If I remember, you're the trainer I saw at the Selection Race the other day… right?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh, dearie me? If I have it well, you're the trainer I saw at the Selection Race the other day… right?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Did you come all this way to scout me? Heheh, aren't you a dedicated one.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: So, what will I have the pleasure of hearing from you? See any future glory in my running?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: So, what sort of conversation will you bless me with? Have you found future glory in my running?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: …? Just?
choice_data_list:
I was just watching you run, thinking 
how much fun you were having.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ehh? …That's all?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh, my… Is that really all you wanted? Hmmm…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Heheh! You're kind of a strange one, aren't you?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Heheh! You're kind of a strange one, aren't you?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well, I'm have fun running… If you have fun watching, be my guest?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well, I'm have fun running… If you like watching, be my guest?
For a while after, I watched her run around, happily, at tremendous speed…
